price: “Monhwε na moannsu amfrε owuo prεko pε, na mmom monsu mfrε owuo bebree”
arabic: لَّا تَدۡعُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ ثُبُورٗا وَٰحِدٗا وَٱدۡعُواْ ثُبُورٗا كَثِيرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lā tadʿū al-yawma thubūran wāḥidan wa-id'ʿū thubūran kathīran
